node.statement: STRATEGY A3: TERM-BY-TERM ULTRAMETRIC BOUND. In the ultrametric case N(x+y)≤max(N(x),N(y)). Exploit the isosceles property: when N(c₁e₁) ≠ N(αv₃), we get N(v₁)=N(c₁e₁-αv₃)=max(|c₁|,N(αv₃)). Classify parameter space by which terms dominate in each factor and derive C≥1 in each region.
